response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am extending an offer to sell this product to you for $950,000. This price reflects the exceptional quality and the potential benefits it can bring to you, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I am confident that this proposal strikes a balance between maximizing value for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product. I am here to assist you every step of the way.", "product_price": 950000}
